sen.j: 藤原 真夏（ふじわら の まなつ、宝亀5年（774年） - 天長7年11月10日 (旧暦)（830年12月2日））は、奈良時代から平安時代初期の貴族。
sen.e: FUJIWARA no Manatsu (774 - December 2, 830 (November 10, 830 by the old calendar)) was an aristocrat from the Nara to Heian Period.
FUJIWARA no Manatsu (774 - December 2, 830 (November 10, 830 by the old calendar)) was an aristocrat from the Nara and Heian Periods.

sen.j: 藤原北家藤原内麻呂の長男として生まれる。
sen.e: Manatsu was the first son of FUJIWARA no Uchimaro, born into the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan.

sen.j: 平城天皇の側近であったが、810年の薬子の変に連座し左遷。
sen.e: He was an adviser to Emperor Heizei; however, he was implicated in the revolt of Kusuko in 810 and was demoted.
He was an adviser to Emperor Heizei; however, he was demoted after being implicated in the revolt of Kusuko in 810.

sen.j: 後に復帰するも最終官位は、従三位刑部卿で止まる。
sen.e: He later resumed his position, and his final rank was Jusani (Junior Third Rank) and Gyobukyo (Lord of Justice).
He later resumed his position, and his final rank and title were Jusani (Junior Third Rank) and Gyobukyo (Lord of Justice).

sen.j: 藤原北家の後の繁栄の嫡流となったのは、同母弟の藤原冬嗣の子孫。
sen.e: It was Manatsu's step brother, FUJIWARA no Fuyutsugu who formed the foundation for prosperity in later years for the direct line of the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan,

sen.j: 真夏の子孫からは、日野家が発祥し、他、広橋家、柳原家、烏丸家、竹屋家、日野西家、勘解由小路家、裏松家、外山家、豊岡家、三室戸家、北小路家の計12家が成立し、真夏流と呼ばれる。
sen.e: Descendents of Manatsu were the origin of the so-called Manatsu line of 12 families; Hino, Horohashi, Yanagihara, Kadenokoji, Karasumaru, Takeya, Hinonishi, Uramatsu, Toyama, Yoyooka, Mimurodo and Kitakoji
